revision.text:
'''Eliot Horowitz''' is the founder and CTO of [[10gen]],<ref>[http://www.10gen.com/team 10gen Executive Team Page]</ref> a software company that develops and provides commercial support for the open source [[NoSQL]] database [[MongoDB]]. Previously, Eliot was the founder CTO of [[ShopWiki]].
He developed the crawling and data extraction algorithm that is the core of ShopWiki's innovative technology.<ref>[http://investing.businessweek.com/research/stocks/private/person.asp?personId=30275130&privcapId=46952162&previousCapId=46952162&previousTitle=10gen,%20Inc Business Week Investing Profile of Eliot Horowitz]</ref> In 2006, Eliot [[BusinessWeek]] selected Eliot as one of its Top 25 Entrepreneurs Under Age 25.<ref>[http://images.businessweek.com/ss/06/10/bestunder25/source/12.htm Business Week's Top Young Entrepreneurs Under 25]</ref> Prior to ShopWiki, Eliot was a software developer in the R&D group at [[DoubleClick]]. Eliot received a B.S. in [[Computer Science]] from [[Brown University]].
